description: Lists the resources that you added to a resource share or the resources that are shared with you.

parameters.name: resourceOwner
parameters.description: Specifies that you want to list only the resource shares that match the following: SELF --- resources that your account shares with other accounts OTHER-ACCOUNTS --- resources that other accounts share with your account.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Specifies that you want to list only the resource shares that include resources of the specified resource type. For valid values, query the  ListResourceTypes operation.

parameters.name: resourceArns
parameters.description: Specifies that you want to list only the resource shares that include resources with the specified Amazon Resource Names (ARNs). (string) ---

parameters.name: resourceShareArns
parameters.description: Specifies that you want to list only resources in the resource shares identified by the specified Amazon Resource Names (ARNs). (string) ---

parameters.name: resourceRegionScope
parameters.description: Specifies that you want the results to include only resources that have the specified scope. ALL --- the results include both global and regional resources or resource types. GLOBAL --- the results include only global resources or resource types. REGIONAL --- the results include only regional resources or resource types. The default value is ALL.

nested_items.name: resources
nested_items.description: An array of objects that contain information about the resources.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The resource type. This takes the form of: service-code: resource-code, and is case-insensitive. For example, an Amazon EC2 Subnet would be represented by the string ec2:subnet.

nested_items.name: resourceShareArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share this resource is associated with.

nested_items.name: resourceGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource group. This value is available only if the resource is part of a resource group.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the resource.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the resource.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the resource was associated with the resource share.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date an time when the association between the resource and the resource share was last updated.

nested_items.name: resourceRegionScope
nested_items.description: Specifies the scope of visibility of this resource:

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
